snippet.title: Baten Kaitos Ⅰ & Ⅱ HD Remaster – Steam Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Two heroes, two journeys, two destinies. Wings of the Heart take flight – now on Steam! Experience two timeless RPGs, remastered in HD.
Baten Kaitos Ⅰ & Ⅱ HD Remaster is available now on Steam!

Pick it up today: https://www.bandainamcoent.com/games/baten-kaitos-i-and-ii-hd-remaster 

#BatenKaitos
Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment America:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
